publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4572 Aileen Campbell: Congratulations to Forth, South Scotland Village of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates the village of Forth, South Lanarkshire, on winning the Calor Gas Village of the Year Award for the south of Scotland region; believes that this is a wonderful achievement for the community as a whole and the Forth and District Initiative that first nominated the village; also congratulates the regional runners-up, Muirkirk and Longriggend; believes that the awards serve as encouragement to small villages across the country to promote their successes and achievements, and wishes the people of Forth the best of luck in the final round for selection of Scotland’s Village of the Year. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, John Scott*, Rob Gibson*, Angela Constance*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Christina McKelvie*
